meanings.definition: Not able to be known or understood.
meanings.sent1: The mysteries of the universe are unknowable to us.
meanings.sent2: The future is full of unknowable possibilities.
meanings.sent3: Trying to solve a riddle with no clues is like facing an unknowable challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were a labyrinth of unknowable complexity.
meanings.sent5: The ancient artifact held an unknowable power within.

meanings.sent1: The unknowable truth remained hidden from all.
meanings.sent2: The unknowable depths of the ocean hold many secrets.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to predict the unpredictable was an unknowable task.
meanings.sent4: The unknowable nature of time perplexed the young scientist.
meanings.sent5: The unknowable answer lingered just out of reach.
